Streamline Your Startup Submissions

The Launchin' Chrome Extension is a simple yet powerful companion tool designed to help you quickly and effortlessly submit your startup to multiple directories.

Key Features:
Auto-Fill Forms: Automatically fill out directory submission forms using data from your Launchin' account.
Easy Organization and Campaign Selection: Use the extensionâ€™s dropdown menus to select your organization and campaign.
Quick Submission: Navigate to any directory's submission page and click the 'Fill Form' button to populate the required fields instantly.
How It Works:
Login: Securely log in with your Launchin' credentials.
Select Organization and Campaign: Use the dropdown menus to choose your organization and campaign.
Auto-Fill Directory Forms: Visit a directory submission page and click the 'Fill Form' button to automatically fill in the necessary fields with your campaign data.
Simplify and speed up your startup submission process with the Launchin' Chrome Extension. Focus more on building your startup and less on repetitive form-filling.
